thread.title: People Are Relating So Hard To This Teen Who Expertly Helped Her Friend Make A Guy Jealous - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: People Are Relating So Hard To This Teen Who Expertly Helped Her Friend Make A Guy Jealous - BuzzFeed News

author: Remy Smidt
title: People Are Relating So Hard To This Teen Who Expertly Helped Her Friend Make A Guy Jealous - BuzzFeed News
text:
View this image › 
Mikayla Simon “Me and Jada have been best friends since we were younger and I’d do anything to make her happy,” Mikayla told BuzzFeed News. 
“We’re basically sisters,” Jada echoed.
On Saturday night, the two friends had a sleepover. 
“I thought my boyfriend was out with another girl,” Jada said. “So I came up with the idea of [Mikayla] dressing up as a boy—so that it looks like I had another boy in the room with me.”
ID: 10747954 2. From the front, the pic is so obviously of a poorly disguised Mikayla. But from behind… View this image › 
Jada Venson ID: 10751357 3. OMG Convincing AF. View this image › 
Jada Venson ID: 10751311 4. The teen sent the pic to her boyfriend over Snapchat and this was how he responded. View this image › 
Jada Venson Xander Viteri, 16, Jada’s boyfriend and the victim of the prank, told BuzzFeed News that he totally fell for it. 
“My first reaction was to just stop talking to her and break up with her,” he said.
ID: 10757654 5. Jada revealed the truth to which her boyfriend said, “You guys have issues” and “[are] petty.” View this image › 
Jada Venson ID: 10752898 6. The teen tweeted the pics and asked “Is your best friend really your best friend if she’s not willing to be this extra to make your man jealous?” Is your best friend really your best friend if she's not willing to be this extra to make your man jealous..
— jada🌻 (@jadavenson_) ID: 10747985 7. “This is some shit you and me used to do!” one person responded, calling someone out. View this image › 
@blondeone13 / Via Twitter: @blondeone13 ID: 10751392 8. And that person came through with a receipt. View this image › 
@ShelbiByrnes / Via Twitter: @ShelbiByrnes ID: 10751399 9. People really related to it. @jadavenson_ @isabeeel17 usss 😂
— 🌼des🌼 (@destinyjoselyn) ID: 10757518 10. “Yas sis love it, this is us.” @Kayy_luhhhh yas sis 💜💃🏽👭 love it, this is us
— GI (@ginadib) ID: 10757524 11. One person plotted… View this image › 
@aleks71011 / Via Twitter: @aleks71011 ID: 10751444 12. And a lot of people let their BFFs know that yes, they would do the same for them. @alenatorres @white_girl1097 I would do this for you guys
— mads (@madisonahlberg) ID: 10748002 @yoitsamberjune I'd do this for u any day
— amdif(mambo)no. 5 (@meowdisonbeal) ID: 10757400 @jadavenson_ @aishaxxmalik i would do dis for u
— som 🌸 (@yagirlsom) ID: 10757414 15. Best friends are the fucking best View this image › 
Jada Venson Btw, Jada and Xander said that they’re still ~together.~ 
Jada said that it turns out, her boyfriend was, as he told her that night, really just chilling with some guys.
